translations: n.肮脏；悲惨；卑劣；道德败坏

phrs.translation: 肮脏, 悲惨, 不洁, 马尼拉的青春
住在肮脏凄惨的环境中

sentences.sentence: He was out of work and living in squalor.
sentences.translation: 他失业了，生活在脏乱不堪的环境中。

sentences.sentence: He had lost his job and was living in squalor.
sentences.translation: 他丢了工作，过得很糟糕。

sentences.sentence: It tells the story of an aspiring young man's attempt to rise above the squalor of the street.
sentences.translation: 它讲述了一个有志青年试图超越其街头穷困生活的故事。
